name: Wishy Washy Spider
description:
Me and my wife made a game!! Play as Sue, a window-washing spider with a crush... It's a tiny game - with two endings?! Try cleaning ALL the dirt on your first playthrough, then prioritize differently on the second... (on rare occasions, a bug seems to make the bg music play really fast - simply restart the game if this occurs)
